name: L Goodwyn
summary: Freelance Graphic Designer with cross-disciplinary experience in web and print design, branding, and jewelry industry marketing. Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator, Acrobat), typography, layout, color management, image retouching, and HTML/CSS. Experienced in development of logos, icons, and marketing materials for high-end brands; skilled in coordinating photo shoots, production pipelines, and social media/website updates.
skills: Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator, Acrobat)

experience.title: Freelance Graphic Designer
experience.description: Influential graphic designer for a high-end jewelry company in New York City; branding, logo/icon development, and marketing collateral. Built WYNDesigns jewelry brand and contributed to multi-platform campaigns. Created a multifunction icon for Evolve.Space and collaborated with founder to realize vision for web and print.

experience.title: Graphic Designer & Assistant
experience.company: Madison Avenue Jewelry Boutique (owned by Ann Ziff)
experience.description: Lead graphic designer producing advertisements, exhibition invitations, and marketing materials; managed production for print and web; updated boutique website and social media; coordinated events and offsite shoots; oversaw jewelry production fabrication; handled client communication and inventory.

experience.title: Owner & Designer
experience.description: Designed and sold bespoke key chains; built brand presence in Amethyst jewelry boutique; donated pieces to charity auctions; created jewelry pieces using metalworking skills (sketching, sawing, welding, soldering, polishing).

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Studio Art
Jewelry Essentials, Colored Stone Essentials, Diamond Essentials
Metal Sculpture and Wire Jewelry (summer program)
education.school: University of Edinburgh, College of Art
